itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM Scale Set based on a Windows Custom Image and configure website via DCS Template
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set usng a custom Windows image. These VMs are behind a load balancer with HTTP load balancing (by default on port 80). This template also allows you to specify a source DSC template and web deploy package to be installed on the individual instances.
summary: This template deploys a Custom Windows Image behind a load balancer with HTTP load balancing rules and installs a default DSC template and Webdeploy package
